description: Head CT - baseline imaging for oral squamous cell carcinoma

series.description: Axial CT images of head and neck

note.text: 3.5cm mass in right buccal mucosa with local invasion. No evidence of nodal metastases. Findings consistent with locally advanced oral squamous cell carcinoma.

description: Follow-up brain MRI to assess for intracranial metastases

series.description: T1 and T2 weighted brain MRI sequences

note.text: No evidence of intracranial metastases. Brain parenchyma appears normal.
